org.richfaces.component

Class AbstractEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      • javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
        • javax.faces.component.UIOutput
          • javax.faces.component.UIInput
            • org.richfaces.component.AbstractEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.faces.component.EditableValueHolder, javax.faces.component.PartialStateHolder, javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.TransientStateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder, javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEventListener, javax.faces.event.FacesListener, javax.faces.event.SystemEventListenerHolder, CoreProps, FocusProps
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIEditor

    public abstract class AbstractEditor
extends javax.faces.component.UIInput
implements CoreProps, FocusProps

    The <rich:editor> component is used for creating a WYSIWYG editor on a page.

    Author:
    Lukas Fryc

    • Method Detail

      • getToolbar

        public abstract String getToolbar()

        Used to change the configuration of the toolbar's button set. There are two configurations available: basic (default), full (enables all of the features).

        It is also possible to define a custom toolbar using the CKEditor toolbar configuration in a config facet

        Default is basic

      • getSkin

        public abstract String getSkin()

        Set the skin of the richfaces editor. Availables skins by default "moono" and moono-lisa.

      • isReadonly

        public abstract boolean isReadonly()
        Used to switch the editor into a read-only mode.

        The width of the editor

      • getTabindex

        public abstract String getTabindex()
        Description copied from interface: FocusProps
        Position of this element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be an integer between 0 and 32767.
        Specified by:
        getTabindex in interface FocusProps
